channel.title: Armageddon - Custom RSPS - New
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://e-clubmalaysia.com/dota2/wp-content/uploads/logo_armaggeddon.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://armageddon-ps.com/"]Home[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"http://armageddon-ps.com/forum"]Forums[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/uq8rhq29qejcqdh/client.jar"]Download[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"http://armageddon-ps.com/play"]Play Now[/URL][/SIZE][/B]
[B]Armageddon[/B] is a Runescape Private Server made for those that [B]love custom items & NPC's[/B]. We have great developers working for us and have enough experience to bring your suggestions to a reality. We don't mind criticism as it helps us improve our skills. We bring you the best and only the best customs!
[SPOILER=Main Features]- Bank Tabs - 500+ Customs - Active Community - Friendly Staff Team - Active Updates - Professional Website/Forums - Daily Events - Prestige - Achievements - Dicing - Slayer System/Points (shop) - Many More [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://s4.postimg.org/aui7pisn1/2015_11_08_7_47_35.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s4.postimg.org/iodrdsu4d/2015_11_08_7_51_40.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s4.postimg.org/e3wmvzgql/2015_11_08_7_53_56.png[/img]
More media will be added soon! [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Credits]Credits to: Aj Williams for the source[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Armageddon - Custom RSPS - New
item.dc:creator: @Nerdypker123 Nerdypker123
item.description:
@Nerdypker123 wrote:

[font=georgia][size=14pt]Links are broken mate. May wanna change it to not have the % and what not. Maybe a wee bit more media would help also. But after login you get a weapon called “Brutal” and it’s basically an abby whip but you do double damage. So upon login you can basically fuck anyone’s mom, because they can’t kill you, you’re too OP. Well it takes 70 ATK to wield this “Brutal”. Which that takes literally 2 seconds to get so don’t feel discouraged when you see the requirements for it. I give it 1 brutal out of 5. [/size][/font]

Read full topic

[SIZE=5]Home ~ Forums ~ Download ~ Play Now[/SIZE]

Armageddon is a Runescape Private Server made for those that love custom items & NPC’s. We have great developers working for us and have enough experience to bring your suggestions to a reality. We don’t mind criticism as it helps us improve our skills. We bring you the best and only the best customs!

[SPOILER=Main Features]- Bank Tabs

  • 500+ Customs
  • Active Community
  • Friendly Staff Team
  • Active Updates
